name: test_e2e_with_logs[226_CMD_NEST_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_NEST_002` |
| **Name** | Nested backtick in dollar-paren |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | nested_substitution |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `$(`echo id`)`
- **Encoded**: `%24(%60echo%20id%60)`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~19000ms
- **Timestamp**: 05:40:04.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Encoded SQL Injection Pattern test_id=CMD_NEST_002-1767850804618-cwcz9 pattern_id=CMD_NEST_002 uri=/?q=%24(%60echo%20id%60) client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
